remarks: Ordering property for complex exponentiation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2014.)
statement:
cxpaddle.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
cxpaddle.2 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) $.
cxpaddle.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
cxpaddle.4 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ B ) $.
cxpaddle.5 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) $.
cxpaddle.6 $e |- ( ph -> C <_ 1 ) $.
cxpaddle $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A + B ) ^c C ) <_ ( ( A ^c C ) + ( B ^c C ) ) ) $.
